about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Neon Wings: Air Race is an adrenaline-filled fast-paced air racing game packed with a cart-game like skill system, spectacular effects and graphics, innovative gameplay mechanics, and good old fun!

WHAT'S WORKING IN THE ACTUAL VERSION

  • 3 axis controled ships! You can move around freely, the sky is the limit!
  • 11 levels - Open environments for taking your own shortcuts
  • 12 unique ships with upgrade system
  • 3 single player game modes: tournament, time trial, and single race
  • Personal upgradable hangar, where you can walk around your ships to admire them
  • Competitive AI with difficulty settings
  • Player progress is checked
  • Local save system working
  • 4 music tracks

FEATUERS UNDER DEVELOPMENT

  • We are investigating the possibilities of a multiplayer mode
  • Balancing levels based on player feedback
  • New game modes: Knockout and Elemination
  • Introducing reversed levels
  • Making new tournaments
  • New music tracks
  • Polished controller support
  • Improvement of sound effects
  • Polishing the overall feel of the game
  • Cloud saving

ABOUT THIS GAME

Neon Wings: Air Race is an adrenaline-filled fast-paced air racing game packed with a cart-game like skill system, spectacular effects and graphics, innovative gameplay mechanics, and good old fun!

  • 11 levels - Open environments for taking your own shortcuts
  • 12 unique ships with upgrade system

name: Neon Wings: Air Race Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU - 2.6ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU - 3.0ghz
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 8Gb

short_description: Neon Wings is mostly inspired by pod racing games, like Star Wars: Episode I Racer, or a not well-known game called Ballistics. Also, you can find elements from Blur or the Mario Kart games, cause we want some action beside the speed!
